projects.about: Showcasing real-world builds across the full development stack.
projects.cabinfy_about: Modern cabin booking platform with multilingual support and sleek admin dashboard for seamless rental management.
projects.moviefy_about: Full-stack movie platform with user and admin interfaces, featuring streaming, reviews, and content management built with React and Node.js.
projects.musicfy_about: A full-stack mobile music app built with bare React Native.
projects.petify_about: Full-stack e-commerce platform for browsing, purchasing pets, real-time chat, product management, and scalable, secure backend architecture.
projects.chatify_about: Real-time chat app with audio/video calls, rebuilt with Go and PostgreSQL for high performance and efficient, scalable backend architecture.
projects.blog_about: A blog app developed with Vue and Go, supporting both English and Chinese, designed to showcase my portfolio and share technical articles.

footer.about: Craft full-stack web apps with React, Vue, Next.js, Node.js, and Go.

about.about: Self-taught developer with finance background, building modern full-stack apps.
